Set up Playwright at repo root
description:
Install and configure Playwright at the monorepo root level:

1. npm init playwright@latest (or manual setup)
2. Install @playwright/test
3. Create playwright.config.ts
4. Install browsers: npx playwright install
5. Create example test structure
6. Add npm scripts to root package.json (if exists) or create one

Keep it minimal - just get Playwright working.

Keep dashboard running after orchestrator completes
description: In cli.py run() function, when orchestrator exits with code 0 (success), don't kill the dashboard. Only shutdown dashboard on Ctrl+C or if dashboard itself crashes. Print message 'Orchestrator complete\! Dashboard still running at http://localhost:8000 - Press Ctrl+C to stop'

title: Fix dashboard static file paths and worker cwd

title: Update path handling for cwd usage

title: [Epic] Solution Architect v2 - Codebase-aware validation CLI
Implement solution-v2 types and core structures
description:
Create types and core structures for solution-architect-v2:

1. New types in src/solution-v2/core/types.ts:
   - CodebaseContext (files, patterns, dependencies found by CC)
   - EdgeCase (description, source, severity, recommendation)
   - TShirtSize (XS/S/M/L/XL with reasoning)
   - ImplementationDiagram (mermaid output structure)
   - Enhanced SolutionSpecV2 (includes all new outputs)

2. Dimensions - keep v1 dimensions but add:
   - technical_constraints dimension
   - edge_cases dimension

3. State machine enhancements in src/solution-v2/core/state-machine.ts:
   - Handle codebase context injection
   - Track edge case discovery phase

Follow existing v1 patterns in packages/nova/src/solution/core/

title: Implement solution-v2 output generators
description:
Create output generators for solution-architect-v2:

1. src/solution-v2/core/mermaid-generator.ts:
   - generateImplementationDiagram(context: CodebaseContext, spec: SolutionSpecV2) -> string
   - Show component interactions, data flows
   - Keep high-level (not detailed implementation)

2. src/solution-v2/core/edge-case-analyzer.ts:
   - analyzeEdgeCases(context: CodebaseContext, conversation: Message[]) -> EdgeCase[]
   - Combine codebase patterns with conversation context
   - Categorize by source (code-pattern, business-rule, technical-constraint)

3. src/solution-v2/core/complexity-estimator.ts:
   - estimateComplexity(context: CodebaseContext, spec: SolutionSpecV2) -> TShirtSize
   - Based on files touched, integration points, new vs modified code

4. src/solution-v2/core/output-formatter.ts:
   - formatV2Output() - combines UX flow + Mermaid + edge cases + sizing
   - Markdown format suitable for implementation handoff

Follow existing v1 pattern in flow-diagram.ts and output-formatter.ts

title: Implement solution-v2 API and CLI
description:
Create the main API class and CLI integration for solution-architect-v2:

1. src/solution-v2/api/architect.ts - SolutionArchitectV2 class:
   - constructor(config, basePath)
   - startSession(existingState?, codebaseContext?) - accepts CC-provided context
   - injectCodebaseContext(sessionId, context) - add context mid-session
   - chat() - enhanced to use codebase context in prompts
   - eject() - produces full v2 output package
   - All existing v1 commands plus new ones

2. src/solution-v2/api/index.ts - exports

3. src/solution-v2/cli/index.ts:
   - Register 'solution-v2' command under nova CLI
   - nova solution-v2 start [--context <file>]
   - Render enhanced outputs (mermaid, edge cases, sizing)

4. src/solution-v2/cli/renderer.ts - terminal rendering

5. Update bin/nova.ts to include solution-v2 command

6. src/solution-v2/core/prompt-builder.ts:
   - Enhanced prompts that incorporate codebase context
   - Guide conversation toward edge case discovery

Follow patterns from existing v1 in packages/nova/src/solution/

title: QA: Verify solution-v2 implementation
description:
Verify solution-architect-v2 implementation:

1. Build passes: npm run build in packages/nova
2. Tests pass: npm run test in packages/nova
3. TypeScript compiles without errors
4. CLI command works: nova solution-v2 start
5. Can inject codebase context
6. Generates all expected outputs:
   - ASCII UX flow diagram
   - Mermaid implementation diagram
   - Edge case report
   - T-shirt complexity sizing
7. Output is markdown format suitable for implementation handoff

If issues found, create blocker beads describing the problem.

title: Commit: Solution Architect v2 implementation
description:
Commit all solution-architect-v2 work after QA passes.

Commit message should be:
Add solution-architect-v2 with codebase-aware validation

- New CLI command: nova solution-v2 start
- Accepts codebase context from Claude Code
- Generates: UX flows, Mermaid diagrams, edge case reports, T-shirt sizing
- Enhanced output format for implementation handoff

Verify:
1. All new files are staged
2. No unrelated changes included
3. Tests pass before commit
4. Push to current branch

title: Add standalone service support
description: Create systemd service files for orchestrator and dashboard, add startup scripts (nova start/stop/status), add daemon mode with proper logging

title: Fix VoiceButton stop not responding during LISTENING state
[Epic] Build Program Nova - Execution Engine + Dashboard
Setup: Project structure + state management
description: Create program_nova/ directory structure, implement state.py for cascade_state.json read/write with file locking, define JSON schema

title: Parser: CASCADE.md parser with DAG
description: Implement parser.py to parse CASCADE.md into task graph with dependencies, extract hierarchy (L0/L1/L2/L3), build DAG for dependency resolution

title: Worker: Spawning, monitoring, logs, tokens
description: Implement worker.py to spawn Claude Code agents as subprocesses, monitor execution, capture stdout/stderr to logs/, track token usage from agent output

title: Orchestrator: Main execution loop
description: Implement orchestrator.py with main loop: parse cascade, resolve ready tasks, spawn workers respecting concurrency limit, handle task completion/failure, advance execution

title: Backend: API server + rollup calculations
description: Implement server.py (FastAPI) with /api/status, /api/tasks/{id}, /api/tasks/{id}/logs endpoints. Implement rollup.py for aggregating status/duration/tokens/cost across hierarchy. Add milestone evaluation.

title: Frontend: Web dashboard with drill-down UI
description: Create dashboard/static/ with index.html, styles.css, app.js. Implement 4-level drill-down (L0 project → L1 branches → L2 groups → task detail), 2-second polling, live duration updates, status colors, milestones panel

title: QA: Verify Program Nova implementation
description: Test end-to-end: parser works, orchestrator spawns workers, state updates correctly, dashboard shows live updates, token tracking works, milestones trigger, logs capture properly

title: Commit: Program Nova implementation
description: Final tests pass, create commit with all Program Nova components, push to remote

title: Restructure as installable package
description: Move code to proper package structure, add CLI entry points in pyproject.toml (nova command), update imports to work as installed package, ensure package can be installed via uv tool install

title: Phase 1: Project scaffolding - React + Node.js monorepo
description: Initialize monorepo with React frontend and Node.js backend, configure TypeScript, set up development tooling and test infrastructure. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 1.

title: Phase 2: WebSocket server and session persistence
description: Implement real-time WebSocket communication and session state persistence that survives connection drops. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 2.

title: Phase 3: Claude API integration with solution-architect prompts
description: Extract solution-architect interview logic and implement Claude API integration for guiding conversations. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 3.

title: Phase 4: Voice pipeline - Whisper STT and OpenAI TTS
description: Integrate OpenAI Whisper for speech-to-text and OpenAI TTS for text-to-speech, with streaming and interrupt handling. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 4.

title: Phase 5: Frontend UI - chat transcript, mic button, text input
description: Build the React frontend with chat transcript, mic button, text input, and status indicators. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 5.

title: Phase 6: Spec generation and storage
description: Generate final markdown spec when interview completes and save to specs/solutions/. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 6.

title: Phase 7: Edge case hardening - error handling and recovery
description: Handle all 14 edge cases from the solution spec to ensure robust operation. See specs/plans/web-voice-planner-plan.md Phase 7.

title: QA: Validate web-voice-planner implementation
description: Run all tests, verify success criteria from each phase, ensure app works end-to-end.

title: Commit: Web Voice Planner implementation
description: Final validation and commit of all web-voice-planner code.

title: Implement dashboard improvements: 1) Stop polling when execution complete, 2)...
notes:
Implemented both dashboard improvements:

1. Stop polling when execution is complete:
   - Modified app.js fetchStatus() to check if all tasks are done
   - Added areAllTasksComplete() function to check for no pending/in_progress tasks
   - Stop polling interval when complete
   - Added 'complete' status indicator

2. Tree view hierarchy visualization:
   - Added new tree view section to index.html
   - Created comprehensive CSS styles for tree nodes with expand/collapse
   - Implemented renderTreeView() to build full CASCADE hierarchy
   - Added color-coded status indicators:
     * Red (pending) - not started
     * Yellow (in_progress) - currently running
     * Green (completed) - finished
   - Implemented rollup logic for parent nodes:
     * Yellow if any child in progress
     * Green if all children complete
     * Red if all children pending
   - Tree shows L1 → L2 → Tasks with metadata (duration, cost)
   - Full expand/collapse functionality
   - Click handlers navigate to detail views

Files modified:
- program_nova/dashboard/static/app.js
- program_nova/dashboard/static/index.html
- program_nova/dashboard/static/styles.css
